scripts.build: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.build:test: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run build-test
scripts.clean: dev-tool run vendored rimraf --glob dist dist-* types *.tgz *.log
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.integration-test:browser: npm run build:test && dev-tool run test:vitest --no-test-proxy --browser -- --coverage
scripts.lint: dev-tool run vendored eslint package.json api-extractor.json src test
scripts.lint:fix: dev-tool run vendored eslint package.json api-extractor.json src test --fix --fix-type [problem,suggestion]
scripts.test: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && dev-tool run build-test && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.unit-test:browser: npm run build:test && dev-tool run test:vitest --no-test-proxy --browser
